fixes.name: Discount Threshold %
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau expression is a constant (0). A constant with no aggregations or parameter references maps directly to the DAX literal 0. No row-level fields or aggregates are used, so this is implemented as a calculated column.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation contains no aggregations or parameter references and evaluates at the row level (constant per row), so it should be a calculated column.
